Location: Temple of Kynareth
Default Outfit: Leather Armor
Combat style: Archer

descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NmBXvmk.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]krXr_GjrMIs[/youtube]
[color=#ffa07a][b]Thank to DRIFTER911 quick presentation video !![/b][/color][b] & [color=#00ffff]Thank to SkyttsTV's review video !![/color][/b][/center]

Hello! My name is [b]YuiH[/b](spell Yui "H", single H), I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

This one is a non-special type of face, the reason I crate her,
because usually I don't want to try the...adult...staff on my main character, to pretend I don't want to hurt them. (How sad am I?)
 
So I crate this character to use ....staff on her, to pleasure myself.
Then some friend said he want her into follower, so I made this.
 
And She maybe the most weak follower in my character,
because I'm not design her is a warrior, she just a normal people. 

[color=#ffa07a][size=5][b]Character[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ff8c00][size=4][b]Emily[/b][/size][/color]
She is a Archer but not specialty.

Body: CHSBHC Height 0.97 Weight 100
Location: Whiterun - Temple of Kynareth
Default Outfit: Leather Armor
Combat style: Archer
Perk: Overdraw, Power Shot, Ranger, Armsman, Agile Defender, Custom Fit

[color=#ffa07a][size=5][b]Recommended Mod[/b][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]

[b][color=#ffa07a][size=5]Knowing issue[/size][/color][/b]
Q: The neck textures seem mismatch with body
A: The face textures is SG Female Texture Renewal and mix with ECE, and the body textures wasn't use the same texture set.

Report to me if her Spell/Perk list is too strong or too weak.

[b][color=#ffa07a][size=5]F&Q[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#ffff00]Q[/color]: I wish your follower has custom voice.
[color=#ff0000]A[/color]: I only have my own, I can't do it by myself, and I am new with CK, stand-alone follower is only I know how to make right now, I even don't know how to edit the dialogue in CK. And I have poor English.
[b]Follower is only I can make right now, I don't know how to make Companions. If you interest with support me, you are very welcome.[/b]

[b][color=#ffa07a][size=5]Credits[/size][/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4888/?]CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39821/?]HRK ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7475/?]CHSBHC Conversions with BBP[/url]
MissAniThrope's C Eyes Reboot - Complete
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only
And author of the original creator of the original Mod by Ren, apachii, NewSeaSims, Nani0427

[b][color=#ffa07a][size=5]Change log[/size][/color][/b]
2014.05.05 - Release.
